author: dario-piotrowicz
message:
docs(docs-infra): add the angular show to the podcast resources (#42756)

PR Close #42756

files.patch:

+          },
           "angular-air": {
             "desc": "Weekly video podcast hosted by Jeff Whelpley with all the latest and greatest happenings in the wild world of Angular.",
